comments.comment: I like that navigation through the prototype is simple
The idea is creative and interesting to explore
I like that there is a lot of detail in this prototype
I like the overall visual design of the prototype
The layout is clean and kept within a grid.
It's a bit difficult to understand the purpose of the prototype at first look.
I wish the page contained a bit less at once.
The flow of the app is a bit confusing.
I wish there were more interactions shown in the prototype.
Reduce the clutter a bit, and this will be a polished prototype.
Each prototype should diverge more to explore different ideas.
You should include all interactions for all pages, especially from the _blank_ page.
Add some margins around the page elements to give them some padding.
The main page is too textual: think of a more visual representation to show positive interactions.
